availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Crittenden County, Kentucky, laborer. Tennessee native. Son of James Jones and Martha Jones. Married to Sarah J. Jones. Stepfather of Nancy E. Jones, S. B. Jones, W. D. Jones, and J. W. Jones. Resident of Crittenden County, Kentucky, in 1850. Laborer in Crittenden County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden County, District 1, p. 230B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden County, West Half of County, p. 319.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 500B-501A.
